ti8m | Frontend, .NET, Java, Devops, everything really | Switzerland, Germany | Salary: 90k-120k CHF | ONSITE | For Switzerland, only EU-passport holders, for Germany, people living in the country highly preferred.

Dear HN crowd, our company has around 200 people and most of us are in Switzerland, some are in Germany. Ti&m stands for "technology, innovation & management". Sounds boring but it's actually pretty cool to work here. We have a mix of product and project-based work. We built products like "Paymit" that is "The Apple-Pay" of Switzerland. Also, we often do client work: We build full-stack things for insurances, banks and other bigger clients. For us it is important that someone wants to stay for several years and not just for a short period. Also, at least willingness to learn German is crucial.

Our hiring process:

1) Resume / code-check

2) Phone call (getting to know each other + quick technical interview, no Google-questions)

3) Onsite (half a day) more technical assessment.

As you can see on our career-website (https://www.ti8m.ch/en/career.html), we have a lot of jobs opened. Please tell us which one of those you see yourself fit, why and send it to:

jobs+hn@ti8m.tech
